thread.title: The new bond market: Algorithms trump humans

author: Financial News
title: The new bond market: Algorithms trump humans
text:
The new bond market: Algorithms trump humans By Katy Burne, The Wall Street Journal 24 September 2015 In midtown Manhattan one recent morning, Ryan Sheftel and a handful of math whizzes at New York-based Global Trading Systems were debating how to profit from rapid-fire changes in the worldâ€™s most-liquid market, US treasuries.
